jabber.PubSub

type
class
available in
flash, js, neko, php
XEP-0060: Publish-Subscribe
PubSub client.

Constructor

new(stream : Stream, service : String)

Instance Variables

service(default,null) : String

Name of the pubsub service

stream(default,null) : Stream

Instance Methods

createNode(name : String, ?config : xmpp.DataForm) : xmpp.IQ

Create a pubsub node with the given name.

deleteNode(name : String) : xmpp.IQ

Delete pubsub node with the given name.

loadAffiliations() : xmpp.IQ

Load list of affiliations for all nodes at the service.

loadItems(node : String, ?subid : String, ?maxItems : Int, ?ids : Array<String>) : xmpp.IQ

Load all items from the given node.

loadSubscriptions(?node : String) : xmpp.IQ

Load list of current subscriptions.

dynamic onAffiliations(a : xmpp.pubsub.Affiliations) : Void

dynamic onError(e : XMPPError) : Void

dynamic onItems(items : xmpp.pubsub.Items) : Void

dynamic onNodeCreate(node : String) : Void

dynamic onNodeDelete(node : String) : Void

dynamic onPublish(node : String, item : xmpp.pubsub.Item) : Void

dynamic onPurge(node : String) : Void

dynamic onRetract(r : xmpp.pubsub.Retract) : Void

dynamic onSubscribe(a : xmpp.pubsub.Subscription) : Void

dynamic onSubscriptions(a : xmpp.pubsub.Subscriptions) : Void

dynamic onUnsubscribe(node : String) : Void

publish(node : String, item : xmpp.pubsub.Item, ?options : xmpp.DataForm) : xmpp.IQ

Publish an item to a node.

purge(node : String) : xmpp.IQ

Remove all items from the persistent store, with the exception of the last published item, which MAY be cached. (This is a optional feature for a pubsub service).

retract(retract : xmpp.pubsub.Retract) : xmpp.IQ

Publisher deletes an item once it has been published to a node that supports persistent items.

subscribe(node : String, ?jid : String) : xmpp.IQ

Subscribe to the given pubsub node.

unsubscribe(node : String, ?jid : String, ?subid : String) : xmpp.IQ

Unsubscribe from the given pubsub node.
